attributes.action: Make public bodies such as the csa and dwp more accountable for their errors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In my oppinion bodies such as the the csa and the dwp are infringing peoples human rights by not giving adequate appeals procedure's against errors made by them. If you feel that you have been denied a fair right of appeal by either of these bodies, please sign this petition.
